website_summaries.verdict: This collapsible bucket's advantage is the included lid and sturdy carrying handles.
pros: Flat and light to carry along on camping trips
Works well to hold live bait
Doesn't fall over when filled with water
cons: The lid tends to not stay on well when the bucket is filled with water

customer_reviews.title: Collapsible Bucket is a Lightweight Workhorse on BWCA Canoe Trip
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a canoe trip to the Boundary Waters and it worked like a charm. Was flat and light to carry along and was useful for toting things around the campsite, filling with water from the middle of a lake (for later filtration) and doing the washing up. As you can see in the photo, the container remained upright even when nearly filled. The mesh bag was handy for storing parts of our filtration system. The lid fits tightly and keeps the contents clean. We would highly recommend this product and the price is certainly right. Have had great luck with this seller, "The Friendly Swede." We'll be back.
customer_reviews.author: BeeCeeGee

customer_reviews.title: Great bucket!
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy using this bucket during our recent camping trip. Carrying a 5 gallon bucket is too heavy for me, but this held the right amount of water, it was easy to carry when full of water. With the lid on, bugs didn't fly into the water. It was easy to pour into the camp sink.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa C. Douville

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camping!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, sturdy material. Bought the black bucket for doing dishes at the camp site. Fill it up in the morning, put the lid on and leave it in the sun. Water is warm when it's time to do the evening dishes. Compact and convenient. Also bought a larger blue one to haul water to the camp site for rinsing dishes and doing other tasks.
customer_reviews.author: Phatfill

customer_reviews.title: A good item to have
customer_reviews.text: A good item to have. It will hold the water and is water proof with a lid and collapsible easy to clean. The only thing is it will collapse with water in it the bucket. Must pay attention to how much water goes into the bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Dominatrix

customer_reviews.title: Regretful Purchase for Camping
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bucket hoping to use it for camping purposes, like bringing water from the spigot, shower bucket, etc., but it wouldn't even hold water after setting it down on the ground. This was especially unusable on one of our campsites that were on a slightly slanted incline, and the entire bucket just spilled over. I just stood there staring at my mistake and how I should have just went to Lowe's hardware to buy a $5 bucket that actually helps me. Now I wish I could return it, but it's past the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Kwok

customer_reviews.title: Product description is accurate.
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 10 liter Friendly Swede collapsible bucket, & found it exactly as described: folds down to about 2”, the lid fits snugly, the handy finger pull assists in emptying, it stays erect when filling, but does drip some when full with the lid on, the carrying straps do tend to fall into the bucket when filling, though they can be detached, and the mesh tool pouch clips on. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not so stable
customer_reviews.text: I really do like this bucket but it is tippy. If you leave this bucket on ground that is slightly out of level it will collapse. I like to leave it out in the sun all day so when I come back from a hike I can have a nice warm shower. I've come back to a half empty bucket a couple of times due to ground that was slightly out of level. Hanging it solves the problem and I can rest easy that it will be full after a good day of hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying a bucket when you don’t want to look like you are carrying a bucket.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been putting light stream sand/gravel in it so people don’t think I am prospecting where I shouldn’t be. I do not classify/sift directly into this but into a plastic 5gal bucket. Then I filter down and pour into this bucket. People see you carrying a filled 5gal bucket and start asking questions. I carry this and no one notice. Great for carry water back and forth and carrying small softer item to my work site. Very sturd, well designed and well made. Will buy a second one that I don’t mind getting muddy or beat up.
customer_reviews.author: J. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: The size is fine and the rigidity is good too
customer_reviews.text: The size is fine and the rigidity is good too. The lid stays on fairly well. My main issue is with the smell. It's awful....like melted plastic. We put water in it and used it later for brushing our teeth. It tasted so gross and the taste wouldn't go away. everyone hated the taste. If you want to use it to hold water, for various reasons, like camp showers or dishes, it's perfectly fine, but just don't use it for drinking or drinks because the smell/ taste is really bad. I will continue using it for watering plants, with the hope that the smell will eventually diminish.
customer_reviews.author: oliveforhealth

customer_reviews.title: Not entirely sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It is very well built; definitely designed to last. HOWEVER, it collapses into itself. This happens on even the slightest non-level surface, but often, not even that; I've had it collapse on a perfectly level surface (used a level to check the surface). If you expect it to stay up, tie the handles to a surface directly above it. I bought the 6 gallon, carrying it back to make camp is always a fun challenge
customer_reviews.author: Anubis Magana

customer_reviews.title: collapsed when filled with water
customer_reviews.text: bought it to hold camp shower water. It worked the 1st day. But the 2nd day, it collapsed with water in it. I thought it was my boy being careless. So I tried, and it collapsed again. The problem with this bucket is that it has no frame/rigidity. it depends on the things you put in to stay up right. water being so fluid, any tiny imbalance and it just collapsed. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: a home owner

customer_reviews.title: Advertising is confusing
customer_reviews.text: The bucket is nice, wish it was larger. My intended use is fishing. I believe the ad photos Are a bit misleading (I'm sure not intentionally) and could be improved, it showed a blue bucket beside the yellow one....somehow I got the impression the customer would receive both. I didn't think the supporting copy was clear about this. I'm also sure it's not the easiest job to illustrate a collapseable bucket, maybe leave out the blue bucket and that will eliminate confusion.
customer_reviews.author: Don  from California

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for camping!!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted!! Ordered a medium sized bucket in black. It arrived on time & very well packaged. Very well made too! I take it camping with us, fill it up with water first thing in the morning, let it sit in the hot Texas sun all day and, by the end of the day I have hot water to wash my face & hands or wash & rinse dishes or do a little bit of laundry! Sadly, on our last trip, I left the lid at the campsite- hoping I can order a replacement soon!
customer_reviews.author: Timsgal80

customer_reviews.title: Well made and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to transport grain and supplements for my horse on a weekend trip. Also to use as a portable water bucket for cleaning tack, etc. The bucket arrived promptly and seems very well made. It suited my purpose well and I was pleased that the lid fit more securely than I anticipated based on previous reviews. It fit snugly enough that I was able to transport the grain in the back of the truck without worrying that the lid would come off in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Laing

customer_reviews.title: Nothing A Tool Bag Couldn’t Do
customer_reviews.text: This product arrive smelling heavily of plastic, I mean it can carry water but after some thought I’ve come to the conclusion that a dewalt tool bag is also a collapsible bag that can effectively store water. Though it is also sturdier. So....take it with however you may.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Sobek

customer_reviews.title: Useful for shrimping!
customer_reviews.text: This collapsible bucket not only has a charming name, it's also very useful. I used it to hold my shrimp/fish catches last summer and it can hold a surprising amount. The one issues I found was that the lid can be a bit of a pain to fit back on and if you aren't caring around all that much in the bucket it tends to fold back in on itself. Otherwise I'm very satisfied with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shamariah Hale

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea. !
customer_reviews.text: I think it is a great looking, easy to use product. I am giving it as a gift along with some other interesting products ,to a family who like to camp and the dad works out of doors on a ranch so often has need of a bucket but no room to carry the usual. He will use it for sure. Thanks for a great gift. MH.
customer_reviews.author: m.2011

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, Nicely made
customer_reviews.text: I'm using the black one to store and solar heat water for camping. Workmanship and materials are first rate. Doesn't leak a drop. The handles are heavy duty and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cole Larson

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be holding up great. Bought to pack on kayak for our camping ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be holding up great. Bought to pack on kayak for our camping supplies to use to put out campfire and to wash up before bed. Perfect size doesn't take much room on our kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannettelicht

customer_reviews.title: It's a great concept, and I love the friendly thank you ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great concept, and I love the friendly thank you for purchasing. Love the little accessory bag that hangs off of it. Would go 5 stars, but it's a bit floppy. Will adjust my rating to 5 stars once we use it a few times and see how it holds water.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Sommers

customer_reviews.title: handy.stores well
customer_reviews.text: Its pretty sturdy.Heats water well in the sun.I did bump the side and lost half the water the first time but over all Im happy with it.I like the side pouch.Its nice for storing the soap shampoo and battery for the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Really love our newest store-all bucket!
customer_reviews.text: Great little collapsible and compact carrier for anything that fits inside and keeps wet items away from anything dry. We bought this sturdy well made product to keep in a small corner of our car or RV storage area. We don’t leave without it. This bucket can also be used as a portable cooler with ice and drinks. Good seller, nice product!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I chose this over other similar ones because this has extra feature. On the bottom there is a hook to place a finger and put other hand on the rim then it's easier to pour out the water. I bought 16L one for camping recently. Ideal size, the material is strong, thick, and sturdy. I collected water from water station and used it for preparing food, washing, etc. Must have for my future camping trips.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor :)
customer_reviews.text: This is a great, packable, bucket. The lid is extra nice - when it's full no winged critters come in to drink & drown - I always kinda hate that, not because they're dead but because they're dead in MY water!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Very strong, great quality and reliability, you would really have to be trying to break this for a defect in it
customer_reviews.text: Super strong great quality for price You would have to be attacking this thing with a knife or an Axe to get a hole in it . or do something extremely stupid
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Clean up is easy if something happens to spill inside and carrying it ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a college freshman to store laundry and cleaning supplies. The ability to collapse the bucket when it's not in use is golden compared to the usual 5 gallon white bucket. Clean up is easy if something happens to spill inside and carrying it around full of supplies is certainly easy to do.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good addition to my camping supplies
customer_reviews.text: I really like this pail. I was concerned that it would not hold it's shape if the pail was less than half full but it did! It WILL tip over and spill if the surface it is on isn't pretty close to level. Love the cover - keeps tree debris out. Pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 09 JKU
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about these buckets, perfect for camping.....we used it to gather water, wash dishes, shower and put out the fire. Perfect for overlanding/exhibition type off-roading where space is an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rose

customer_reviews.title: You'll Find You'll Use It and Love It
customer_reviews.text: Funkiness-a definite 5 Star. I'm getting everyone on my list one for Christmas. They're just cool. My wife uses hers to carry food back and forth to work or to picnics. I use mine for driving trips to carry a towel and soap into rest stops because: you never know.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Smith

customer_reviews.title: It works for me.
customer_reviews.text: Is it perfect? No. Nothing is perfect, but I bought this bucket to take camping to haul water. It does the job, and it doesn't leak. It stands up fairly well; it doesn't fall over. And having a lid and a mesh pouch that attaches are a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: she

customer_reviews.title: Very practical.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Just beware that it is "not self standing". When you have water in it, it's really helpful. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: S__J

customer_reviews.title: Very handy....good quality !
customer_reviews.text: This product seems to be well made...although I haven't put it to the test as of yet, it does have a strong order,I left sit outopen for a couple of days.....it would also have been nice to have the top zippers to the bottom to keep it collapsed when not in use. All in all I'm happy with the product !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After few days the buckef had a tear so I got a replacement.  Must be the quality od the item
customer_reviews.text: After few days the buckef had a tear so I got a replacement. Must be the quality od the item
customer_reviews.author: Dietter Alex Perez Serrato

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Meets all my expectations to use for live bait transport. I have a bait tube for my kayak but transporting live bait to the tube has proven difficult and only time will tell if this bucket is perfect for this purpose but I'm willing to bet it is. It's definitely durable enough and the size I expected.
customer_reviews.author: BCAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Large travel laundry tub
customer_reviews.text: It arrived quickly. Plan to use it when I am traveling to launder clothes. Fits in my suitcase. Look forward to using it. Filled it up: doesn't leak, empties easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great for a beach trip as it’s packable. I actually used it for fishing and crabbing. Solid product and very tough!
customer_reviews.author: ChinaBAMA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our RV
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bucket. Was just a bit smaller than I expected but is well designed and good material thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael K. W.

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my shower water at camping. Space saver and really sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Tried out this bucket last night along with my handheld shower for camping. Perfect size and durable. Very thankful for the lid because I purchased this bucket with the intention of filling it up and letting it warm in the sun for awhile to use for showering. May buy more for when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great stow away bucket
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice collapsible bucket that I used with the Zodi instant hot shower. Super easy to store, too!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Frizzy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent general purpose collapsible bucket!
customer_reviews.text: The Friendly Swede Collapsible Bucket is a well built product. The material is light and durable at the same time. I have tested it by filling it full of water from my bathtub and there were no leaks. Recently just used it for shopping and it works well if you're purchasing a couple of items. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: robotwrangler224

customer_reviews.title: poured easy, &never leaked a drop totally full
customer_reviews.text: Finally got to use The Friendly Swede Bucket camping at the sleeping bear dunes dh campground and was really impressed!Holds it shape with little water,poured easy,&never leaked a drop totally full!Going to order another sometime soon!
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: nice compact bucket for camping
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than expected, I have no room for a traditional bucked, so this one collapses nicely to fit almost anywhere. Also easy to use and holds some shape when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M

customer_reviews.title: I used it to carry dishes and wash and it worked great.
customer_reviews.text: This bucket is a work horse. This small size is about the size of a camping plate or small frying pan. If you need more space get the bigger one. I used it to carry dishes and wash and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: ✨ Marriana Maloney ✨

customer_reviews.title: ... is placed on a level surface/ground as it can easily tip to one side and spill the water
customer_reviews.text: This product is well built but you have to make sure that when you use this item especially when camping that it is placed on a level surface/ground as it can easily tip to one side and spill the water.
customer_reviews.author: Solomon

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: The collapsible bucket looks great. I’m sure it will be perfect for y needs.
customer_reviews.author: Al Schamber

customer_reviews.title: Wasted effort
customer_reviews.text: We got large. Without lid it can’t stand I it’s own and flips over wasting the effort to get water for camping. Do not recommend. Maybe smaller item would work better
customer_reviews.author: Pete B

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Bought it for camping and use with ...
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Bought it for camping and use with my Life-straw filter. Material appears to be a heavy duty Neoprene. Will update review after use this spring
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This bucket is awesome. There is no worry that it will tip when empty or full. I first used a friend's then ordered two for myself.
customer_reviews.author: T. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our camping trips. The bucket is really well made. Works great for moving water around and as a sink for cleaning pots and pans.
customer_reviews.author: CKayaks

customer_reviews.title: Great gear!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for camping because we have a much smaller vehicle than we used to have. It is a fun, bright yellow so easy to find, Made sturdy and durable. We used it for the first time on a day trip with our dog. We filled it half full with water, popped the lid on and set it in the trunk. I was concerned about stability while traveling, but we had no issues at all. Out sweet girl had water when needed and we have a great piece of gear for our outdoor adventures!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great collapsible bucket.
customer_reviews.text: Great collapsible bucket. Great for camping. Toting water. Washing dishes, Showers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Essential garden tool.
customer_reviews.text: Gives me hot water to wash off the garden dirt and sweat before going in the house. The dip method is best. You must level the collapsible Swede, or he will level himself bc it’s water and his sides won’t hold up when water levels itself. 😀
customer_reviews.author: Joan G.

customer_reviews.title: Very fast service!
customer_reviews.text: This seller has a very fast and efficient service . Pays close attention to the wants and needs of its customers. The bucket I bought was of high quality and a fair price. You can't ask for more than that.
customer_reviews.author: William Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Good quality construction and features
customer_reviews.text: Good quality construction and features. Slight plastic smell, I expect this will go away with use. With care, this should last a long time. Update - decided to get a few more for various things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase from this company again
customer_reviews.text: "Love the sturdy design. Will try it out on my 9 month travel journey. ” Very good customer service as well!
customer_reviews.author: holly R

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed handy travel bucket
customer_reviews.text: This high quality durable bucket has so many uses and packs down for easy travel.
customer_reviews.author: hilary

customer_reviews.title: Nice bucket
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bucket! Used it for camping and it worked well. Only issues is I wish I had ordered a bigger bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Cait Skate

customer_reviews.title: Bucket Okay for Some...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe okay for laundry needs. I also needed something that would serve as a water pail with my large dogs should we need it when away from home. I noticed it gave off a chemical smell after being in my trunk for two days. Possibly a chemical reaction to rising temperatures. I could not risk having my thirsty dogs drink from this. I also noted it had a minor flaw in one seam but did not test it for water leakage. Seller was very responsive to a question about bucket durability.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.Shopper

customer_reviews.title: He loved it and asked where did I purchased
customer_reviews.text: Peace I ordered this Bucket as a gift to a Man who loves the outdoors, camping and gadgets. He loved it and asked where did I purchased. He loves it. When he opened it the excitement was nice to see cause he always gives the best thoughtful gadgets u can think of. 20 stars for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shontane F.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This has been our dish bucket for our current camping trip! It's been great!
customer_reviews.author: Erinm

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product from a Great Company!
customer_reviews.text: This is an extremely well made and high quality product! I would expect nothing less from this great company! The Friendly Swede continues to impress!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this bucket. Different sizes stack inside each other.
customer_reviews.author: jasper j harrison

customer_reviews.title: Collapsible bucket
customer_reviews.text: I love it and when not in use it's out of way
customer_reviews.author: Ladell bradley

customer_reviews.title: i really like both the design AND execution
customer_reviews.text: i really like both the design AND execution. well made, well designed... the mesh pocket is BRILLIANT. I cannot wait to use it. TACK, Friendly Swede
customer_reviews.author: Tiger Shah

customer_reviews.title: Should be useful.
customer_reviews.text: Won't be used until camping season, but looks like it will work great at the camp site.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy R. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great portable bucket
customer_reviews.text: The bucket is as advertised, well build, light weight and very portable. The bucket also serves our need to always carry a axe, bucket and shovel where we live.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A great purchase. It's exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Collapse very easily and dump out water if you do not hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Collapse very easily and dump out water if you do not hold up straight or pick straight up without any tilt. They will begin to collapse as you use the water and the water level goes down. They do work great to heat and keep water warm for bathing. They are great if on short camping trips and will be packing them up when leaving. I have a cabin with an outdoor shower tent, so a plastic bucket works better.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Using it but would not purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Bucket slouching is a real problem even when it's filled with water. I have another brand that is much more stable when filled.
customer_reviews.author: kattracks

customer_reviews.title: The size looks great & of course they take up less room than ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for washing up mess kits on Boy Scout campouts. The size looks great & of course they take up less room than the basins we use. Bucket shape should be easier for carrying water from source to cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: hollys

customer_reviews.title: Really nice. May even spruge and buy the blue
customer_reviews.text: Really nice. May even spruge and buy the blue one
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Baker

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Just what I was looking for. Appears durable.
customer_reviews.text: Just received this and am getting ready for an upcoming camping trip. It's well constructed and is everything I expected. Look forward to using it.
customer_reviews.author: GHS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is love it. Very nice shape. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!
customer_reviews.text: That's a good name for it collapsible because it will collapses when lease expected. Anywhere, anytime, it well collapse and you will be without water. Terrible design!
customer_reviews.author: Danny D.

customer_reviews.title: Will be useful for camping and home use
customer_reviews.text: Really like that it comes with a lid. Not a lot of these types of buckets do.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice little bucket
customer_reviews.text: Works great for carrying water as well as doing the dishes! Dries farily quickly when set out in the sun to dry at the campsite.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

product_meta.title: The Friendly Swede Collapsible Bucket for Camping, Travel and Gardening - Portable Folding Wash Basin Water Container Pail, with Lid and Handy Tool Mesh Pocket
feature_bullets: COMPACT BUCKET WITH POURING HANDLE: To our multi-functional flexible bucket we have added a handle on the bottom side for easier pouring. You can also use it to hang your bucket to dry! A Collapsible Bucket is useful for fishing, car washing, gardening, picnic or camping.Use it as an ice bucket for cold beers on a sunny day,storing your fresh caught fish, for window cleaning or as a camping sink for doing dishes on the go. Or why not draw a cool and soothing foot bath after a long day of hiking?

FREE FROM TOXIC BPA AND PHTHALATE: Our Friendly Foldable bucket is made of Heavy Duty Industrial Grade 500D PVC Tarpaulin, a strong durable material with double-stitched, sealed seams. It is free from toxins such as BPA and Phthalates - for your safety and the environment’s. This also makes it suitable as a travel dog bowl, horse feed bucket or apple picking basket!

SPACIOUS & STURDY: Flat and compact when not in use, but still contains up to 10 liters (2.64 gallons/ 338 oz.) 25x20cm (9.85" x 7.87" ) / 16 liters (4.23 gallons/541 oz.) 30x25cm (11.80" x 9.44") / 23 liters (6 gallons/768 oz.) 33x27cm (13" x 10.63") / 30 liters (7.9 gallons/896 oz.) 35x30cm (13.78" x 11.8")

REMOVABLE MESH POCKET AND LID INCLUDED: Use the removable mesh bag for your fishing equipment, gardening tools, dishwashing soap, cutleries or anything you need to bring together with your foldable bucket. A lid with durable handle is also included.

LIFETIME WARRANTY - RISK FREE SHOPPING: To back it all up, we are offering our Friendly Lifetime Warranty for this camping bucket. Our World Class customer service team is here for you every day of the year and happy to help answer ANY questions you may have within hours
